cast.name: 托马斯·布罗迪-桑斯特 Thomas Brodie-Sangster

introduction: 'The Ugly Duckling' is the third short film in a trilogy of Grimm Fairytale adaptations. It was filmed in Oxfordshire, Buckinghamshire and London, October 2012.It is a coming-of-age story about a young boy whose love of bright colors and eccentric fashions drives him to leave his very straight stubborn home in such of companionship and expections.It stars Thomas Sangster and during his voyage of self discovery he encounters 3 travellers (The Ravens) on a dark river path. They welcome him to warm himself bytheir fire but when he does their interrogation of him begins. The Short is currently in Post Production and should be touring festivals in early 2013.'
